Name: Alpha Hole Prison - A Yaoi, Gay, Bara Visual Novel
About the game: A Gay Prison Visual Novel Dating Sim! Earthling Miguel Santos has been sentenced to life at Alpha Hole, a notorious space prison. His survival depends on using his charms to convince a powerful ally to protect him. A gigantic seven route hardcore gay dating sim loaded with animated scenes! A Dynamic Visual Novel Dating Sim of 300,000 Words! 6 Super-Sexy Adults-Only Routes 135 Animated Sex Scenes! Threesome Options in Every Route! 75 Endings, Including Demo Endings 400+ Gorgeous CGs An Intricate 'All Choices Matter' Stats System Partial Voice Acting Pressing 'v' on your keyboard activates AutoVoice, and will have all game text read out loud to you All Love Interests Versatile! 24 Exclusive Music Tracks Partial voice acting by Pyreprince (Chihuahua in Mister Versatile) Partial voice acting by Kiba Walker (Camp Buddy, Full Service, Mister Versatile, Morningdew Farms, and To Trust an Incubus) Partial voice acting by Sean Chiplock (Full Service, To Trust an Incubus, Spiderman: Miles Morales, The Last of Us II) Partial voice acting by Khristopher Padua Patial voice acting by Sean Chiplock (Mornindew Farms, Mister Versatile, One Punch Man, Persona 5, Demon Slayer) Partial voice acting by Nathan Matthews (To Trust an Incubus, The Yaoikuza) Partial voice acting by Bryce Chadwell (Morningdew Farms) Partial voice acting by L. Alphonso Partial voice acting by Khristopher Padua Other voices include Steve 'Warky' Nunez as Johan (Camp Buddy, Full Service, To Trust an Incubus, Mornindew Farms, Ishida and Asakura), Cole Feuchter, Preston Cowley, Reece Bridger, Riley Moore, Ryan Hoyle, Terrance Drye, and Steven Aries.
